TopicTitle: What are the best sound mods?

Articles.Content:
i know that RealPlume, ShipEffects, RocketSoundEnhancement add sounds to the game such as rubmling and SRB crackling but i was wondering if anyone managed to run those mods together because i couldn't find any info about compatibility on the net.

in case it's incompatible, which one of those mods do yall perfer and why?
I don't know the above, but I have found Docking Port Sound Effects to be the essential sound mod. Ka-chunk!
